interface:
Provide interface for "message info" class serialization.
Return buffer size enough to hold serialized message info.
Serialize class "message info".
Read message info prefix from the given data, and if it is valid, return a length of bytes of the whole message info.
Zero returned if length can not be determined from the given data, and this means that there is no message info at the data beginning.
Deserialize class "message info".
